title: Were airline shares short before September 11th?
subtitle: The widespread allegations of internal trafficking prior to the events of 11 September are generally based on reports of unusual commercial activity prior to the events of 11 September in companies whose shares fell after the attacks.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: In the days immediately prior to the attacks of 11 September, large quantities of stocks in United and American Airlines were trafficked by persons with prior knowledge of the attacks of 11 September.
